item.title: Publications
item.description: Also check my Google Scholar profile , ORCID or ResearchGate for my publications.

item.title: Science Communication
item.description:
Science, Technology, Engineering and Maths are for everyone, and while it can take years to conduct research the concepts should be accessible to all. For that reason, I write articles and give outreach talks about my ongoing research.
Also, pretty much if you offer me a complimentary mug Iâ€™ll happily give a Science talk.
